page.title: 16SPADEWORK:CONSERVATION
page.content: The{Spadework}team is a section of {Notts.County Council Leisure Services {Department.}Projects they have worked on include a{Wildlife Area}at{Rufford {Comprehensive School.} A plan has been drawn up to manage the area for the next decade. It will include a{Spring Meadow,Summer {Meadow,Nettle Bed,Marsh Area,Woodland {Area,Hedges and Scrub.}It is hoped to provide a wide range of Flora, and to encourage Birds,Insects and small Mammals. It will provide a staging post between the{River Maun and Sherwood {Forest.}Pupils will be planting a wide range of seeds in September,and trees and shrubs in October and November.It is hoped it will become a valuable teaching resource as well as an ecological resource.
